author: USA TODAY, Karina Zaiets and Ramon Padilla, USA TODAY
title: Coronavirus, diabetes, obesity and other underlying conditions: Which patients are most at risk?
description: According to a CDC report, nearly 90% of patients hospitalized with coronavirus (COVID-19) had one or more underlying health conditions.
content: Though people of all ages are affected by coronavirus, many of those who develop severe complications after contracting it have preexisting medical conditions. According to a CDC report, nearly 90% of adult patients hospitalized with COVID-19 in the US had on… [+7497 chars]
